title: Democratic Reps. call on Biden to commute federal death sentences
shortDescription: Dem. Reps. Ayana Pressley and Cori Bush called for Biden to commute the death sentences of those on federal death row in a press conference Tuesday.

title: Wisconsin attorney general adds 10 charges in Trump fake elector case
shortDescription: Wisconsin's AG slaps a handful of felonies against 2020 fake elector case defendants, Kenneth Chesebro, James Troupis and Mike Roman.

title: Donald Trump picks former Fox News host Kimberly Guilfoyle as ambassador to Greece
shortDescription: Guilfoyle is a former prosecutor and worked at Fox News for more than a decade. She has been romantically linked to Donald Trump Jr.

title: White House condemns violence against 'corporate greed' after CEO murder
shortDescription: "Violence to combat any sort of corporate greed is unacceptable," White House press secretary Karine Jean-Pierre said.

title: Who is Andrew Ferguson? Donald Trump taps commissioner to lead FTC
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump on Tuesday tapped Federal Trade Commissioner Andrew Ferguson to lead the consumer protection and antitrust agency.

title: Biden says it was 'stupid' to leave his name off COVID checks
shortDescription: In a speech that looked to cement his legacy on the economy, Joe Biden credited Donald Trump with one thing: putting his signature on COVID checks.

title: Trump says companies that invest $1 billion in US will get quicker permits
shortDescription: Trump ran on boosting American manufacturing and promised tariffs on goods made overseas. Now he's pitching faster permitting for big investments.

title: Trump's pivotal treasury pick has a 'clear path' in the Senate. Here's why.
shortDescription: In picking Bessent, Trump – despite his anti-establishment rhetoric – chose a less ideological, more conventional financier for the post.

title: Trump's first-term DOJ faulted for far-reaching leak investigation
shortDescription: A Justice Department inspector general report raised concerns about the ways in which prosecutors in the first Trump administration seized records.

title: Trump jabs Canada's Prime Minister Justin Trudeau as 'governor'
shortDescription: “It was a pleasure to have dinner the other night with Governor Justin Trudeau of the Great State of Canada,” Trump wrote on social media.

title: Mexican president rejects Trump tariff threat in video | Fact check
shortDescription: This video shows the Mexican president noting caravans had already stopped due to actions Mexico undertook well before Trump's tariff threat.

title: Elon Musk's new political capital bought him a seat at the Trump table
shortDescription: JD Vance who? Elon Musk’s role as right-hand man to Donald Trump takes shape as the billionaire gets more involved on Capitol Hill and beyond.

title: Manhattan DA: keep Trump criminal case alive after election
shortDescription: Manhattan prosecutors urged a criminal court against throwing out President-elect Donald Trump's 34 felony convictions in light of his election.

title: Trump and NY AG spar over whether election moots $485 million case
shortDescription: NY Attorney General Letitia James' office is fighting President-elect Donald Trump's call for her to drop her real estate fraud case.

title: 77 Nobel laureates warn against Trump's RFK health nomination
shortDescription: The letter said putting Kennedy in charge of the Department of Health and Human Services would “put the public’s health in jeopardy.”

title: Trump mulls Kari Lake for ambassador to Mexico
shortDescription: Trump is also considering three prominent Arizonans for roles at the DEA, the U.S. Marshals Service, and the Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco and Firearms.

title: Column: Black women say they're tired, but resilient, after election
shortDescription: Columnist Suzette Hackney talked to Black women around the country about how they're recovering from the 2024 election and planning for the future.

title: Trump brings former Ginny Thomas attorney Mark Paoletta back to OMB
shortDescription: The Office of Management and Budget is a gatekeeper for all federal spending and reviews policy changes.

title: Clip shows Fox News host condemning Hunter Biden pardon | Fact check
shortDescription: The original clip shows Pirro condemning Hunter Biden's pardon, saying pardons are generally for people who have already "paid their debt to society."
